drug.name: Ecgonine
drug.synthesis-reference: Lowell M. Somers, James E. Wynn, "Derivatives of benzoylecgonine, ecgonine and ecgonidine and methods for preparing and using same." U.S. Patent US5559123, issued December, 1985.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as tropane alkaloids. These are organic compounds containing the nitrogenous bicyclic alkaloid parent N-Methyl-8-azabicyclo[3.2.1]octane.

drug-interaction.name: Amphetamine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Ecgonine is combined with Amphetamine.

drug-interaction.name: Linezolid
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Ecgonine is combined with Linezolid.
